title: Update HarfBuzz to v2.5.3
body:
**Description of Change**

HarfBuzz is now updated to 2.5.3
UnicodeFunctions are now customizable via delegates like FontFunctions
Some overloads that except int as Unicode codepoint were removed for more consistency

**Bugs Fixed**

- Related to issue #894 

**API Changes**

Added: 
 
- `UnicodeFunctions (UnicodeFunctions parent)`
- `UnicodeFunctions UnicodeFunctions.Parent {get;}`
- `uint UnicodeFunctions.GetMirroring (uint unicode)`
- `bool UnicodeFunctions.TryCompose (uint a, uint b, out uint ab)`
- `bool UnicodeFunctions.TryDecompose (uint ab, out uint a, out uint b) `
- `voidUnicodeFunctions. SetCombiningClassDelegate (CombiningClassDelegate del, ReleaseDelegate destroy = null)`
- `void UnicodeFunctions.SetGeneralCategoryDelegate (GeneralCategoryDelegate del, ReleaseDelegate destroy = null)`
- `void UnicodeFunctions.SetMirroringDelegate (MirroringDelegate del, ReleaseDelegate destroy = null)`
- `void UnicodeFunctions.SetScriptDelegate (ScriptDelegate del, ReleaseDelegate destroy = null)`
- `void UnicodeFunctions.SetComposeDelegate (ComposeDelegate del, ReleaseDelegate destroy = null)`
- `void UnicodeFunctions.SetDecomposeDelegate (DecomposeDelegate del, ReleaseDelegate destroy = null)`

Changed:

 - `void FontFunctions.SetHorizontalFontExtentsDelegate (FontExtentsDelegate del, ReleaseDelegate destroy) => void FontFunctions.SetHorizontalFontExtentsDelegate (FontExtentsDelegate del, ReleaseDelegate destroy = null)` etc.

Removed:
- `void FontFunctions.SetHorizontalFontExtentsDelegate (FontExtentsDelegate del)` etc.

- `UnicodeCombiningClass UnicodeFunctions.GetCombiningClass (int unicode)`
- `UnicodeGeneralCategory UnicodeFunctions.GetGeneralCategory (int unicode)`
- `Script UnicodeFunctions.GetScript (int unicode)`


**Behavioral Changes**

**PR Checklist**

- [x] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [x] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
